rooms.name: Lobby & Living Area
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance area with a central corridor leading to the living room. Features include ornate woodwork and local motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen design incorporating Vastu principles for auspicious placement, with ventilation openings and storage space.

rooms.name: Balcony (Living Room)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony adjoining the living area to embrace natural light and open-air views. Decorated with local flora and stone finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style guest room featuring a spacious balcony for morning freshness and Vastu-aligned decor.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper Level Connection)
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with access to a private balcony on the upper level. Designed with natural elements and traditional Kerala motifs.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large wooden door with traditional carvings and open corridor design, aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.

openings.name: Service Door
openings.description: Access point for service personnel ensuring privacy and efficient workflow.

openings.name: Balcony Accesses
openings.description: Multiple balconies providing natural ventilation and outdoor views. Designed following local traditions.

openings.name: Home Theater Entrance
openings.description: A discreet passage leading to the home theater setup, integrated with soundproofing and modern amenities.

additional_features.description: A traditional Kerala-style swimming pool designed for relaxation, incorporating local aesthetics and landscaping.
A traditional dining area with wooden furniture and intricate carvings, encouraging family gatherings in accordance with Vastu principles.

notes: The design adheres to Traditional Kerala architectural elements combined with modern amenities. Duplex layout is planned for the second level (not included) focusing on bedrooms and additional living spaces.
Local building norms are considered, ensuring proper structural support and compliance with zoning regulations.
Vastu principles have been integrated into room placements and directional alignments.
